MemberSignature.Value: public IsoSampleDescriptionBox (TagLib.Mpeg4.BoxHeader header, TagLib.Mpeg4.File file, TagLib.Mpeg4.Box handler);

Docs.param: A containing the header for the new instance.
A containing the handler that applies to the new instance.
Docs.summary: Constructs and initializes a new instance of for a specified header by reading from a file.
Gets the number of sample entries contained in the current instance.
Docs.value: A containing the number of sample entries contained in the current instance.
Docs.remarks: The first few children of the current instance (equaling "EntryCount") will be of type or a subclass depending on the handler type.

Docs.summary: Gets the offset of the data after box specific information is accounted for.
Docs.value: A specifying the seek position at which the data starts.

Docs.summary: This class provides access to ISO/IEC 14496-12 SampleDescriptionBoxes.
